data.eml:eml: Key to the genera of Oxyptilini (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae: Pterophorinae), with descriptions of two new genera

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alipanah, Helen, Sari, Alireza, Sarafrazi, Alimorad, Gielis, Cees, Manzari, Shahab (2010): Key to the genera of Oxyptilini (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae: Pterophorinae), with descriptions of two new genera. Zootaxa 2693: 21-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199602
